name: redux-list
description: A collection organizer using lists and maps to manage data entities
author: mbeaudru <manuel.beaudru@mirakl.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:es && npm run build:remove-mocks
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.build:remove-mocks: rm -rf es/**/__mocks__ && rm -rf lib/**/__mocks__ && rm -rf es/__mocks__ && rm -rf lib/__mocks__
